MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the PA5 postcode area of Johnstone. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 12.02am. Repairs are taking longer than expected due to the complexity of the fault and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11.00am. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 08.18AM on 3rd February 2021.
